title: 请问可以改minecraft正版账号的密保邮箱么？
author: moshuroom
txt_content: 我买了一个人的正版账号，我想改掉他绑定的邮箱（害怕他改密码），请问有办法改邮箱么？

replies.author: moshuroom
replies.txt_content: 求答案啊！！！Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID.这是什么意思，为什么一点改邮箱就出现这个！？？{:10_503:}大家帮帮忙啊，跪求！{:10_503:}

Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID
错误！拒绝请求。去帮助改变你的电子邮件地址，访问我们的技术支持中心。当联系客户支持，确保你有你的游戏交易ID
  我想应该可以改吧 你去官网登陆试试  我在那里改过我的名字  密保   邮箱倒是没有试过
